pages.title: Electronic Wave Humanoid Black Tackle
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Jeanne & Kamen Rider Aguilera with Girls Remix (2022, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:stronger/devices/tackle_belt#black_tackle_belt)Black Tackle Belt$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Fire Resistance II$(li)Strength II
